name: Pyrofighter
description:
This is a good Playable Demo for 2-4 Player
and i'm very happy to release it.

Goal of the Level TorchSmash:
Try to Dash into your Friends to
drop there health and finally Win

It supports PS4 and Xbox360 Controller
At the moment there is only
1 Gamemode TorchSmash
2 Levels Grassland and TechWorkshop

Please leave me a Feedback in the Comments Below and have much fun with the Game!
